idea-plugin.name: Connector for AWS Lambda
idea-plugin.description: Update functions powered by AWS Lambda with JAR-artifact. Please read more about AWS Lambda on the following site: https://aws.amazon.com/lambda Amazon Web Services, and AWS Lambda are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates in the United States and/or other countries.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 1.0/li>
  • Update of functions powered by AWS Lambda with jar-file.
  • The function is specified by typing its name in a dialog.
  • The function name is verified with a list of functions.
  • Refresh of the list of Java-functions.
  • JAR-file is automatically taken from the last selected or (if not applicable) - the first JAR-artifact of the selected project.
  • AWS credentials expected to be configured with AWS CLI.
  • The list of functions or last selected function name and jar-file name are stored in settings of the project.
  • Implemeted a tool window with a function list and an update-function button.

action.description: Update for AWS Lambda function with JAR-artifact.
Refresh the list for AWS Lambda functions.
